short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to provide Impero Classroom Cloud with greater power

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Impero Cloud Extension is used to integrate Impero Education Pro Functionality with Impero Cloud Services offering a seamless experience for users.

*Please Note*
The Impero Cloud Extension is required for some Classroom Cloud functionality. Users monitoring and interacting with devices through the Classroom Cloud interface will need to load this extension.
